      • calculateMaxPriorityFeePerGas

        public static BigInteger calculateMaxPriorityFeePerGas(BigInteger baseFeePerGas)
        Calculate max priority fee per gas based on recent block fee reward history
        Parameters:
        baseFeePerGas - The base fee per gas, used to cap the priority fee
        Returns:
        computed max priority fee
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if galactica fork hasn't happened
